persist.dao

Interface TransactionDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySqlTransactionDAO

    public interface TransactionDAO
    Transaction DAO which provides all possible operations on the persistent data concerning Transaction.
    Since:
    2021-01-05
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Julien Wiegandt
